name: TorontoStar
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Follow the latest news with Toronto Star on Alexa. Get headlines for the top stories and hourly updates from a source you trust, with the Flash Briefing from Toronto Star.

Use the Alexa settings, under Account, to put the Toronto Star at the top of your news list. Then just ask "Alexa, what’s the news?” or "Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?" to get the most current headlines from the Star.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
